unnormalised: Hey Auto Enthusiasts! Get ready for some serious rubber-burning action! This week’s been a launch-fest, bigger than a Diwali bonus!
normalised: Hey Auto Enthusiasts! Get ready for some serious rubber-burning action! This week’s been a launch-fest, bigger than a Diwali bonus!

unnormalised: First up, Mahindra unveiled the souped-up 'Scorpio N Adventure' in the Thar Desert - talk about rugged! Expect pre-bookings to open after Dusshera.
normalised: First up, Mahindra unveiled the souped-up 'Scorpio N Adventure' in the Thar Desert - talk about rugged! Expect pre-bookings to open after Dusshera.

unnormalised: Then, Tata Motors surprised everyone with the 'Punch Micro-SUV CNG' - a tiny powerhouse that promises to sip fuel like your chai at a roadside dhaba. Rumored to cost around Rs. 7.5 Lakhs.
normalised: Then, Tata Motors surprised everyone with the 'Punch Micro-S U V C N G' - a tiny powerhouse that promises to sip fuel like your chai at a roadside dhaba. Rumored to cost around rupee seven lakh fifty thousand.

unnormalised: Not to be left behind, Maruti Suzuki dropped hints about the 'Jimny 5-Door' launch near Republic Day.
normalised: Not to be left behind, Maruti Suzuki dropped hints about the 'Jimny five-Door' launch near Republic Day.

unnormalised: And hold your horses, folks! Dr. Agarwal, from the Automotive Research Association of India (ARAI), leaked details about a new electric scooter from Ather, boasting a 150 km range.
normalised: And hold your horses, folks! Doctor Agarwal, from the Automotive Research Association of India (A R A I), leaked details about a new electric scooter from Ather, boasting a one hundred and fifty kilometer range.

unnormalised: Lastly, a new showroom, “Sharma Auto World”, opened in Connaught Place, Delhi, spreading across a massive 5000 sq ft. They’re offering special discounts during Navratri. Keep those engines revving!
normalised: Lastly, a new showroom, “Sharma Auto World”, opened in Connaught Place, Delhi, spreading across a massive five thousand square feet. They’re offering special discounts during Navratri. Keep those engines revving!
